Issues.Title: Vertical scroll bar is not visible when horizantal scroll bar moved to extreme left in wpf datagrid
Issues.Body:
I am currently developing a WPF application where it has a WPF data grid. The issue I'm facing here is,when I scroll horizontal scroll bar to extreme left side, Vertical scroll bar is not visible.I have mentioned what I have tried in below. Further,I got this below code snippet using a answer provided for this [link ](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5975737/wpf-datagrid-horizontal-scrollbar-not-showing)

```
<ScrollViewer HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Auto"
              VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled">
    <DataGrid>
        ...
    </DataGrid>
</ScrollViewer>
```
Any guidance or suggestion will be much appreciated!
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Vertical scroll bar is not visible when horizantal scroll bar moved to extreme left in wpf datagrid" (#2794)

Issues.Title: Image Control should have ImageLoaded event
Issues.Body:
The `Image` control has an `ImageFailed` event but no `ImageLoaded` event.

Note: Not referring to the `Image.Loaded` event, but an event that the image has been decoded and rendered.

Other event name possibilities

- `ImageCompleted`
- `ImageRendered`
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Image Control should have ImageLoaded event" (#2792)

Issues.Title: Resx code file not generated when referenced in WPF project
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: 3.1.102
* Windows version: Windows 10 1909
* Does the bug reproduce also in WPF for .NET Framework 4.8?: Yes
* Is this bug related specifically to tooling in Visual Studio (e.g. XAML Designer, Code editing, etc...)?  No 
* Security issues and bugs should be reported privately, learn more via our [responsible disclosure guidelines](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/blob/master/README.md#reporting-security-issues-and-security-bugs).


 **Problem description:**
ResX code file does not get generated for WPF project as soon as the file is referenced (either from xaml or cs).

When all references are removed the file gets generated.

Works for WinForms and Console applications.
 
 **Actual behavior:** <!-- callstack for crashes / exceptions -->
File not generated leading to compile error of "Cannot find the type..."

 **Expected behavior:**
File generated and resolved by the rest of the application.
 
 **Minimal repro:**
[reswpf.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/files/4346184/reswpf.zip)
[resnowpf.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/files/4346199/resnowpf.zip)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Resx code file not generated when referenced in WPF project" (#2785)

Issues.Title: WPF tasks return false from ITask.Execute without logging errors
Issues.Body:
.NET Core SDK (reflecting any global.json):
 Version:   3.1.200
 Commit:    c5123d973b

 **Problem description:**
Certain WPF targets can return false without logging errors.

To help customers diagnose "failed" builds without errors, [MSBuild has started logging errors when a task returns "false" from Execute without logging an error](https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/pull/4940).

This has started catched WPF tasks:

```
Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	MSB4132	The "GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly" task returned false but did not log an error.	Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editors	C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Microsoft.WinFx.targets	444	
Error	MSB4132	The "GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly" task returned false but did not log an error.	Microsoft.VisualStudio.ProjectSystem.Managed.VS	C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Microsoft.WinFx.targets	444	
Warning    MSB4132    The "MarkupCompilePass1" task returned false but did not log an error.    Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.VisualBasic    C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\3.1.200\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WindowsDesktop\targets\Microsoft.WinFX.targets    225
```
I don't have a repro, but I've hit all above many times over the past few weeks. A pass should be done to verify that that these tasks log an error every occasion that they return false from ITask.Execute.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "WPF tasks return false from ITask.Execute without logging errors" (#2778)
